top_issue.title: [circt-verilog][arcilator] `arcilator` fails to lower `llhd.constant_time` generated from simple SV delay (`#1`)

analysis.reason: No existing issue matches the exact combination of sim.fmt.literal + arcilator legalization failure. Issue #9467 is the closest match (same tool, same error type, different operation). The specific sim.fmt.literal legalization failure appears to be a new, previously unreported bug.
analysis.highest_similarity: Issue #9467 shares the same legalization failure pattern with arcilator, but targets a different operation (llhd.constant_time). The underlying issue is likely part of broader arcilator legalization gaps being tracked.
analysis.next_steps: This should be reported as a new issue unless there is evidence that #9467 was intended to cover sim.fmt.literal operations as well.
